name: Marauder's Gloves
flavorText: "One day, your quivers will run empty, your traps will fail, and the enemy will surge forward. You will be left with nothing but the grip you keep on your blade. Never forget this."—Hunter Cie Wyrtam
flavorTextHtml: "One day, your quivers will run empty, your traps will fail, and the enemy will surge forward. You will be left with nothing but the grip you keep on your blade. Never forget this."—Hunter Cie Wyrtam

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [8.0 - 10.0]%

setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Companion calls all companions to your side.(4) Set:     
 Sentries deal 400% increased damage and cast Elemental Arrow, Chakram, Impale, Multishot, and Cluster Arrow when you do.(6) Set:     
 Your primary skills, Elemental Arrow, Chakram, Impale, Multishot, Cluster Arrow, Companions, and Vengeance deal 12,000% increased damage for every active Sentry.
setDescriptionHtml:
(2) Set:
Companion calls all companions to your side.
(4) Set:
Sentries deal 400% increased damage and cast Elemental Arrow, Chakram, Impale, Multishot, and Cluster Arrow when you do.
(6) Set:
Your primary skills, Elemental Arrow, Chakram, Impale, Multishot, Cluster Arrow, Companions, and Vengeance deal 12,000% increased damage for every active Sentry.
